member.summary: Initializes XPCOM using the specified directory.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.Xpcom.RegisterFactory(System.Guid,System.String,System.String,Skybound.Gecko.nsIFactory)
member.summary: Registers a factory to be used to instantiate a particular class identified by ClassID, and creates an association of class name and ContractID with the class.
member.param: The ClassID of the class being registered.
The name of the class being registered. This value is intended as a human-readable name for the class and need not be globally unique.
The ContractID of the class being registered.
The nsIFactory instance of the class being registered.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.Xpcom.ProfileDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the directory which contains the user profile. The default directory is Geckofx\DefaultProfile in the user's local application data directory.

member.name: T:Skybound.Gecko.Xpcom.ProfileProvider
member.summary: A simple nsIDirectoryServiceProvider which provides the profile directory.

member.name: T:Skybound.Gecko.Xpcom.QI_nsIInterfaceRequestor
member.summary: A special declaration of nsIInterfaceRequestor used only for QueryInterface, using PreserveSig to prevent .NET from throwing an exception when the interface doesn't exist.

member.name: T:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection
member.summary: Manipulates and queries the current selected range of nodes within the document.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.GetRangeAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the range at the specified index.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.Collapse(Skybound.Gecko.GeckoNode,System.Int32)
member.summary: Collapses the selection to a single point, at the specified offset in the given DOM node. When the selection is collapsed, and the content is focused and editable, the caret will blink there.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.Extend(Skybound.Gecko.GeckoNode,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extends the selection by moving the selection end to the specified node and offset, preserving the selection begin position. The new selection end result will always be from the anchorNode to the new focusNode, regardless of direction.
member.param: The node where the selection will be extended to.
Where in node to place the offset in the new selection end.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.CollapseToStart
member.summary: Collapses the whole selection to a single point at the start of the current selection (irrespective of direction). If content is focused and editable, the caret will blink there.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.CollapseToEnd
member.summary: Collapses the whole selection to a single point at the end of the current selection (irrespective of direction). If content is focused and editable, the caret will blink there.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.ContainsNode(Skybound.Gecko.GeckoNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns whether the specified node is part of the selection.
member.param: True if the function should return true when some part of the node is contained with the selection; when false, the function only returns true when the entire node is contained within the selection.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.SelectAllChildren(Skybound.Gecko.GeckoNode)
member.summary: Adds all children of the specified node to the selection.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.AddRange(Skybound.Gecko.GeckoRange)
member.summary: Adds a range to the current selection.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.RemoveRange(Skybound.Gecko.GeckoRange)
member.summary: Removes a range from the current selection.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.RemoveAllRanges
member.summary: Removes all ranges from the current selection.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.DeleteFromDocument
member.summary: Deletes this selection from the document.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.SelectionLanguageChange(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Modifies the cursor BIDI level after a change in keyboard direction.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.ToString
member.summary: Returns the whole selection as a plain text string.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.DomSelection
member.summary: Gets the unmanaged nsISelection which this instance wraps.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.AnchorNode
member.summary: Gets the node in which the selection begins.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.AnchorOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset within the (text) node where the selection begins.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.FocusNode
member.summary: Gets the node in which the selection ends.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.FocusOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset within the (text) node where the selection ends.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.IsCollapsed
member.summary: Gets whether the selection is collapsed or not.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSelection.RangeCount
member.summary: Gets the number of ranges in the selection.

member.name: T:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoRange
member.summary: Identifies a range of content in a document.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoRange.DomRange
member.summary: Gets the unmanaged nsIDOMRange which this instance wraps.

member.name: T:Skybound.Gecko.AutoJSContext
member.summary: Creates a scoped, fake "system principal" security context. This class is used primarly to work around bugs in gecko which prevent methods on nsIDOMCSSStyleSheet from working outside of javascript.

member.name: T:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences
member.summary: Provides access to Gecko preferences.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Reads all User preferences from the specified file.
member.param: Required. The name of the file from which preferences are read. May not be null.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Saves all User preferences to the specified file.
member.param: Required. The name of the file to which preferences are saved. May not be null.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences.Reset
member.summary: Resets all preferences to their default values.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences.GetPreferenceType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the of the specified preference.
member.param: Required. The name of the preference whose type is returned.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences.SetLocked(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether the specified preference is locked. Locking a preference will cause the preference service to always return the default value regardless of whether there is a user set value or not.
member.param: Required. The preference to lock or unlock.
True if the preference should be locked; otherwise, false, and the preference is unlocked.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences.GetLocked(System.String)
member.summary: Gets whether the specified preference is locked.
member.param: Required. The preference whose lock status is returned.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences.User
member.summary: Gets the preferences defined for the current user.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences.Default
member.summary: Gets the set of preferences used as defaults when no user preference is set.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoPreferences.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets or sets the preference with the given name.
member.param: Required. The name of the preference to get or set.

member.summary: Navigates to the specified URL using the given load flags.
member.param: The url to navigate to. If the url is empty or null, the browser does not navigate and the method returns false.
Flags which specify how the page is loaded.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoWebBrowser.Navigate(System.String,Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags,System.String,System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Navigates to the specified URL using the given load flags, referrer, post data and headers.
member.param: The url to navigate to. If the url is empty or null, the browser does not navigate and the method returns false.
Flags which specify how the page is loaded.
The post data to send, or null. If you use post data, you must explicity specify a Content-Type and Content-Length header in .
Any additional HTTP headers to send, or null. Separate multiple headers with CRLF. For example, "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded\r\nContent-Length: 50"

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.None
member.summary: This is the default value for the load flags parameter.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.IsRefresh
member.summary: This flag specifies that the load should have the semantics of an HTML META refresh (i.e., that the cache should be validated). This flag is only applicable to loadURI. XXX the meaning of this flag is poorly defined.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.IsLink
member.summary: This flag specifies that the load should have the semantics of a link click. This flag is only applicable to loadURI. XXX the meaning of this flag is poorly defined.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.BypassHistory
member.summary: This flag specifies that history should not be updated. This flag is only applicable to loadURI.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.ReplaceHistory
member.summary: This flag specifies that any existing history entry should be replaced. This flag is only applicable to loadURI.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.BypassCache
member.summary: This flag specifies that the local web cache should be bypassed, but an intermediate proxy cache could still be used to satisfy the load.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.BypassProxy
member.summary: This flag specifies that any intermediate proxy caches should be bypassed (i.e., that the content should be loaded from the origin server).

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.CharsetChange
member.summary: This flag specifies that a reload was triggered as a result of detecting an incorrect character encoding while parsing a previously loaded document.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.StopContent
member.summary: If this flag is set, Stop() will be called before the load starts and will stop both content and network activity (the default is to only stop network activity). Effectively, this passes the STOP_CONTENT flag to Stop(), in addition to the STOP_NETWORK flag.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.FromExternal
member.summary: A hint this load was prompted by an external program: take care!

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.AllowThirdPartyFixup
member.summary: This flag specifies that the URI may be submitted to a third-party server for correction. This should only be applied to non-sensitive URIs entered by users.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoLoadFlags.FirstLoad
member.summary: This flag specifies that this is the first load in this object. Set with care, since setting incorrectly can cause us to assume that nothing was actually loaded in this object if the load ends up being handled by an external application.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSecurityState.Insecure
member.summary: This flag indicates that the data corresponding to the request was received over an insecure channel.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSecurityState.Broken
member.summary: This flag indicates an unknown security state. This may mean that the request is being loaded as part of a page in which some content was received over an insecure channel.

member.name: F:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoSecurityState.Secure
member.summary: This flag indicates that the data corresponding to the request was received over a secure channel. The degree of security is expressed by GeckoSecurityStrength.

member.summary: Gets the which imported this style sheet.

member.summary: Gets the of the DOM element which imported this style sheet. Typically, this is a LINK tag.

member.summary: Represents a collection of rules in a style sheet.

member.summary: Attempts to reload the rule list.

member.summary: Adds a new rule to the end of the collection.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoStyleSheet.StyleRuleCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Inserts a rule at the specified position in the collection. The return value is the index in the list where the item was actually inserted, or -1 if the rule contains syntax errors and could not be added to the collection.

member.name: M:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoStyleSheet.StyleRuleCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a specific rule from the collection.

member.summary: Removes all rules from the collection.

member.summary: Returns an IEnumerator which can enumerate through the rules in the collection.

member.summary: Gets whether the collection is read-only.

member.summary: Gets the number of items in the collection.

member.summary: Gets the selector text for this rule, or null if it is not a style rule; otherwise, null.

member.summary: Gets this rule formatted as CSS text.

member.name: T:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoResponse
member.summary: Represents a response to a Gecko web request.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoResponse.ContentType
member.summary: Gets the MIME type of the channel's content if available.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoResponse.ContentCharset
member.summary: Gets the character set of the channel's content if available and if applicable.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoResponse.ContentLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the data associated with the channel if available. A value of -1 indicates that the content length is unknown.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoResponse.HttpRequestMethod
member.summary: Gets the HTTP request method.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoResponse.HttpRequestSucceeded
member.summary: Returns true if the HTTP response code indicates success. This value will be true even when processing a 404 response because a 404 response may include a message body that (in some cases) should be shown to the user.

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoResponse.HttpResponseStatus
member.summary: Gets the HTTP response code (a value of 200 indicates success).

member.name: P:Skybound.Gecko.GeckoResponse.HttpResponseStatusText
member.summary: Gets the HTTP response status text.
